item.title: Do Not Deskturb Almost Ready for Preorders
item.description: Coming in the next few weeks. Follow us on social media or newsletter to find out first.

item.title: Follow us or leave a review on Google
item.description: Get the latest news and leave a review on our Google Business Profile

item.title: Product Feedback Wanted (1 min online form)
item.description: We're looking for feedback on our product. Please fill in the form and share with people you know!

item.title: Preorder opens for both products Friday 3pm!
item.description: Our first stock is available from Friday, delivery in the next 2 weeks. Limied stock available, order while stocks last.

item.title: Price reduction for Do Not Deskturb Smart
item.description: Was £25, now £20! Order our smart product from our website. Visit us today. Compatiable with Alexa, Google Assistant, smartphone app and Google Home. Delivery before Christmas.
